TEXT.TITLE: STANDARD COMMERCIAL <STOB.O> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
qtr ended March 31 Shr 74 cts vs 79 cts Net 4,069,000 vs 3,458,000 Revs 173.2 mln vs 120.8 mln Year Shr 2.65 dlrs vs 2.73 dlrs Net 13.3 mln vs 11.9 mln Revs 618.4 mln vs 520.7 mln NOTE: Full name is Standard Commercial Tobacco Co.
Latest qtr and year includes tax loss carryforwards of 771,000 dlrs and 1,042,000 dlrs, respectively, and a loss of 613,000 dlrs for discontinued operation. Prev qtr and year includes tax loss carryforwards of 469,000 dlrs and 1,902,000 dlrs, respectively. Reuter
